REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2170 reute r f BC-CO-OPERATIVE-<COBK.O> 06-01 0067

TEXT.TITLE: CO-OPERATIVE <COBK.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Co-operative Bancorp said it completed the acquisition of all the issued and outstanding stock of the Quincy Co-operative Bank <QBCK.O>. Under the agreement, Quincy stockholders will receive 30 dlrs cash for each share owned of the Quincy Co-operative Bank, for a total transaction of approximately 50 mln dlrs, Co-operative said. Reuter
